description.value: Character can Reroll failed Willpower Tests to avoid or recover from Pinning. They also gain +10 to Willpower Tests to resist the effects of enemy intimidation effects. In a Social Conflict, if the character's opponent's uses Intimidate, the character gains +20 to the Opposed Test.
